name: Z-Cubed
description: Z-Cubed is an ERC-20 token focused on bringing sweeping change to the DeFi space. Z³’s foundation is their innovative Proof-of-Holdings auto-mining consensus, developed as a zero emission alternative to PoW and PoS mining protocols. Z³ has several utilities on their roadmap, all of which align with the goal of improving the DeFi space for investors of all levels, and which lay the groundwork for a broad suite of products. First among them, Z³ will be leveraging the power of decentralization through their CUBEDAO³, empowering its holders to drive project decision-making. The DAO will be closely followed by the launch and implementation of Zev³, a product that promises unparalleled improvements to accessibility, safety, and security. Z-Cubed’s vision is clear; a thriving crypto space free from malicious actors and open to all.
